channel.title: FoL Awards 2021 - Nominations Thread
channel.description:
This is the thread for awards nominations! Please be sure to include (1) who you are nominating, (2) what award you are nominating them for, and (3) a short description of why you are nominating them.
Please ensure that all discussion is strictly *on-topic*.
Credit to [the Mafia Universe mods](https://www.mafiauniverse.com/forums/threads/29730-Mafia-Universe-Awards-2021-Nominations) for creating the system that I've modelled these awards off of.
# Rules - Anyone who has played at least one game on FoL can nominate another member for an award. Anyone who has played or hosted at least one game on FoL is eligible to receive an award. - All nominations must have a **nomination** and a **second** to be valid. You cannot nominate yourself, nor can you nominate a team that you were part of (for example, if you were scum in FoL 99, you can't nominate the FoL 99 scumteam for a group award; however, you could nominate a teammate for an individual award). - A minimum of 3 days must pass between a game ending and any nominations for that game. - All games that occurred at least in part in 2021 are eligible for awards. For this year only, there is also a "legacy" category, for games prior to 2021. - The deadline for nominations is one week after the last game that began in 2021 ends. - Once the nominations period is over, all relevant awards will be eligible for voting. Voting will be done via forum poll (the results will not be visible to anyone except forum moderators).
# Awards
**[color = steblue]Individual Awards[/color]**
[details="Summary"] **Best Town Perfomance - Single Player (small game):** *For a good individual performance as town in a game with 15 or fewer players.*
**Best Town Performance - Single Player (large game):** *For a good individual performance as town in a game with 16 or more players.*
**Best Scum Perfomance - Single Player (small game):** *For a good individual performance as scum in a game with 15 or fewer players.*
**Best Scum Performance - Single Player (large game):** *For a good individual performance as scum in a game with 16 or more players.*
**Best Neutral/Third Party Performance:** *For a good individual performance as a neutral role, in a game of any size.*
**Best Misc Performance:** *For good performance in a Misc game. In extraordinary circumstances, a team may be nominated for this award.*
**Best Use of a Power Role:** *For a player who displayed skill in using their Power Role (PR). This may be any PR, even a very weak one.*
**Best Mechanical/Strategical Player:** *For a player who consistently displays good knowledge of mechanics and uses them effectively, as either alignment.*
**Best Replacement Player:** *For a player who consistently replaces into games, and plays solidly after doing so.*
**Rookie-of-the-Year:** *For a player whose first game was in 2021.*
**Most Improved Player:** *For a player whose first game was PRIOR to 2021, but who improved significantly in 2021.*
**Most Dedicated/Enjoyable/Enthusiastic Player:** *For a player who is dedicated, enthusiastic, and enjoyable to play with, even when the game is going poorly.*
**Best Team Player:** *For a player who does a good job at working with their teammates, regardless of their alignment.*
**Best Misc Player:** *For a player who consistently does well in Misc games.*
**Best Town Player:** *For the best overall town player.*
**Best Scum Player:** *For the best overall scum player.*
**Best All-Around Player:** *For a player who is "good at everything."* [/details]
**[color = steblue]Team Awards[/color]**
[details="Summary"] **Best Town Performance, Group (Small Game):** *For collective excellence as town, in a game with 15 or fewer players.*
**Best Town Performance, Group (Large Game):** *For collective excellence as town, in a game with 16 or more players.*
**Best Scum Performance, Group (Small Game):** *For collective excellence as scum, in a game with 15 or fewer players.*
**Best Scum Performance, Group (Large Game):** *For collective excellence as scum, in a game with 16 or more players.* [/details]
**[color = steblue]Hosting Awards[/color]**
[details="Summary"] **Best Host:** *For a host who consistently hosts well-designed and enjoyable games.*
**Best Flavor:** *For a host who writes good flavor.*
**Best Setup:** *For an interesting, enjoyable, and well-designed setup.*
**Best Misc:** *For an interesting, enjoyable, and well-designed Misc.*
**Best Role/Mechanic:** *For a role or mechanic that was both interesting and well-designed.* [/details]
**[color = steblue]Fun Awards[/color]**
[details="Summary"] **Funniest Moment:** *For the funniest moment.*
**Best Fakeclaim:** *For the most effective fakeclaim.*
**Community MVP:** *For the community member most willing to help out the community and make it a good place to be. Mods are not eligible.* [/details]
**[color = steblue]Legacy Awards[/color]**
[details="Summary"] **Best Town Performance (Individual):** *For the best individual performance as town, in a game (of any size) prior to 2021.*
**Best Scum/Neutral Performance (Individual):** *For the best individual performance as scum or neutral, in a game (of any size) prior to 2021.*
**Best Town Performance (Group):** *For the best collective performance as town, in a game (of any size) prior to 2021.*
**Best Scum Performance (Group):** *For the best collective performance as scum, in a game (of any size) prior to 2021.*
**Best Setup:** *For an interesting, enjoyable, and well-designed setup, prior to 2021.*
**Best Misc:** *For an interesting, enjoyable, and well-designed Misc, prior to 2021.* [/details]

item.title: FoL Awards 2021 - Nominations Thread
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I nominate this role

image1242×1149 174 KB

From this game https://fol-archive.netlify.app/t/fm-dota-2-

eevees-wild-ride-game-end/75394

For best designed role. It was such a good role, that the person who rolled it couldn’t believe their eyes when they saw it - the horror on their face when they saw their role-card showed how beautiful it was. It was such a good designed role that mere mortals, no not even the one who borrowed the role from somewhere else, could not understand the complexity of the role. This is evident by the fact that me and Eevee realized four months later that we made a mod error (which we then corrected by stating in the thread that we did) because we didn’t actually understand the role (and still don’t). I’m not sure what else you could ask for when designing a role

Read full topic

item.title: FoL Awards 2021 - Nominations Thread
item.dc:creator: Nightingale
item.description:
Arete - Each night*, as the nerd, you learn the characters of all players you whisper. Then, choose a player; they die.

Chloe - Each night*, choose a character. If in play, that character joins the Game Moderation Team. (All instances of that character die, and a Game Moderation Team member becomes that character) Otherwise, a player dies.

DatBird - Each night*, choose a player; they die. If you win, a player new to the forums (TL 2-) who made a positive impact (was most responsible for their team losing) wins as well. [+1 new player]

Katze - Each night*, a Katze dies. You know one other Katze. You only win if all non-Katze are subsumed. Due to your convincing FPSing, you register as evil and and a Reviewer too. [Most players are Katze]

Read full topic
